description: Numbers n such that n and 7n + 2 both prime.
example: 3 is in the sequence because 7 * 3 + 2 = 23, which is prime.5 is in the sequence because 7 * 5 + 2 = 37, which is prime.7 is not in the sequence because 7 * 7 + 2 = 51 = 3 * 17.
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..100000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(7*n+2)] // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
